title: Marriage & Family Commandments Quiz - Biblical Commands About Marriage & Family
description: Test your knowledge of the 27 biblical commandments related to marriage & family. Covers 11 positive and 16 negative commandments from the Torah.

questions.question: Which commandment requires marrying a wife through a marriage agreement and sanctification?
options: Marry a wife by means of a marriage agreement and sanctification
Have children with one's wife
Issue a divorce by means of a 'get' document
A man must free the widow of his childless brother from the obligation to marry him
questions.correctAnswer: Marry a wife by means of a marriage agreement and sanctification
questions.explanation: Commandment #122 is positive and commands marrying a wife through a marriage agreement and sanctification as stated in Deuteronomy 22:13.

questions.question: Which of the following is a negative commandment related to sexual relations?
options: Do not have sexual relations with women not married by means of a marriage agreement and sanctification
Have children with one's wife
One who seduces a maiden must marry the maiden if she chooses
A man must marry the widow of his childless brother
questions.correctAnswer: Do not have sexual relations with women not married by means of a marriage agreement and sanctification
questions.explanation: Commandment #123 prohibits sexual relations with women not married by means of a marriage agreement and sanctification, as found in Deuteronomy 23:18.

questions.question: What is required if a man seduces a maiden according to the commandments?
options: He must marry the maiden if she chooses
He must pay a fine but not marry her
He must divorce his wife immediately
He must free the widow of his childless brother
questions.correctAnswer: He must marry the maiden if she chooses
questions.explanation: Commandment #132 states that a man who seduces a maiden must marry her if she chooses, according to Deuteronomy 22:29.

questions.question: Which commandment forbids remarrying an ex-wife after she has married someone else?
options: A man must not remarry his ex-wife after she has married someone else
Issue a divorce by means of a 'get' document
Do not withhold food, clothing, and sexual relations from your wife
Do not strike your father and mother
questions.correctAnswer: A man must not remarry his ex-wife after she has married someone else
questions.explanation: Commandment #127 prohibits a man from remarrying his ex-wife if she has married another man, as stated in Deuteronomy 24:4.

questions.question: Which positive commandment concerns continuing a family line through children?
options: Have children with one's wife
Respect your father or mother
Mourn for relatives
A man must marry the widow of his childless brother
questions.correctAnswer: Have children with one's wife
questions.explanation: Commandment #125 is positive and commands having children with one's wife, based on Genesis 1:28.

questions.question: Which commandment requires issuing a divorce by means of a 'get' document?
options: Issue a divorce by means of a 'get' document
A man must free the widow of his childless brother from the obligation to marry him
Do not be a rebellious son
Do not let a eunuch marry into the Covenant people
questions.correctAnswer: Issue a divorce by means of a 'get' document
questions.explanation: Commandment #126 is positive and requires issuing a divorce through a 'get' document, as commanded in Deuteronomy 24:1.

questions.question: Which negative commandment forbids withholding food, clothing, and sexual relations from one's wife?
options: Do not withhold food, clothing, and sexual relations from your wife
Do not marry those who are not members of the Covenant
Do not let Moabite and Ammonite males marry into the Covenant people
Do not curse your father and mother
questions.correctAnswer: Do not withhold food, clothing, and sexual relations from your wife
questions.explanation: Commandment #124 forbids withholding food, clothing, and conjugal rights from one's wife, as found in Exodus 21:10.

questions.question: Where in Scripture is the commandment to respect your father or mother found?
options: Exodus 20:12
Leviticus 19:3
Deuteronomy 21:18
Numbers 5:30
questions.correctAnswer: Exodus 20:12
questions.explanation: Commandment #584 commands respect for parents and is found in Exodus 20:12.

questions.question: Which commandment is negative and prohibits marrying those who are not members of the Covenant?
options: Do not marry those who are not members of the Covenant
A man must marry the widow of his childless brother
One who seduces a maiden must marry the maiden if she chooses
Mourn for relatives
questions.correctAnswer: Do not marry those who are not members of the Covenant
questions.explanation: Commandment #162 forbids marrying those outside the Covenant, as stated in Deuteronomy 7:3.

questions.question: Which positive commandment requires a man to marry the widow of his childless brother?
options: A man must marry the widow of his childless brother
Have children with one's wife
Fulfill the laws of the woman suspected of adultery
Respect your father or mother
questions.correctAnswer: A man must marry the widow of his childless brother
questions.explanation: Commandment #128 commands levirate marriage, requiring a man to marry his childless brother's widow, as found in Deuteronomy 25:5.

questions.question: Which commandment states that a man who slanders his wife with accusations of adultery must remain married to her?
options: A man who slanders his wife with accusations of adultery must remain married to his wife
A man who slanders his wife with accusations of adultery must not divorce her
One who seduces a maiden must marry the maiden if she chooses
Do not withhold food, clothing, and sexual relations from your wife
questions.correctAnswer: A man who slanders his wife with accusations of adultery must remain married to his wife
questions.explanation: Commandment #134 is positive and requires a man who slanders his wife with adultery accusations to stay married to her, as stated in Deuteronomy 22:19.

questions.question: True or False: The commandment 'Do not strike your father and mother' is found in Exodus 21:15.
options: True
False
questions.correctAnswer: True
questions.explanation: Commandment #583 forbids striking parents and is recorded in Exodus 21:15.

questions.question: True or False: The commandment to mourn for relatives is a negative commandment.
options: True
False
questions.correctAnswer: False
questions.explanation: Commandment #587 is positive and instructs to mourn for relatives, as found in Leviticus 10:19.

questions.question: True or False: A childless widow must not remarry until the ties with her brother-in-law are removed.
options: True
False
questions.correctAnswer: True
questions.explanation: Commandment #130 forbids a childless widow from remarrying until her ties with her brother-in-law are removed, according to Deuteronomy 25:5.

questions.question: True or False: Do not curse your father and mother is a positive commandment.
options: True
False
questions.correctAnswer: False
questions.explanation: Commandment #582 is negative, forbidding cursing parents, as recorded in Exodus 21:17.

questions.question: True or False: The commandment 'Do not be a rebellious son' is found in Deuteronomy 21:18.
options: True
False
questions.correctAnswer: True
questions.explanation: Commandment #586 forbids being a rebellious son and is located in Deuteronomy 21:18.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: According to the commandments, a man must free the widow of his childless brother from the obligation to marry him if he is ____.
options: unwilling to marry her
already married
childless himself
not a member of the Covenant
questions.correctAnswer: unwilling to marry her
questions.explanation: Commandment #129 states that if a man is unwilling to marry his childless brother's widow, he must free her from the obligation, as in Deuteronomy 25:9.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: The positive commandment to fulfill the laws of the woman suspected of adultery is found in _____.
options: Numbers 5:30
Deuteronomy 22:19
Exodus 21:10
Leviticus 19:3
questions.correctAnswer: Numbers 5:30
questions.explanation: Commandment #136 commands fulfilling the laws concerning a woman suspected of adultery and is found in Numbers 5:30.

questions.question: Which commandment forbids putting oil on the meal offering of a woman suspected of adultery?
options: Do not put oil on the meal offering of a woman suspected of adultery
Do not put frankincense on the meal offering of a woman suspected of adultery
Do not withhold food, clothing, and sexual relations from your wife
Do not marry those who are not members of the Covenant
questions.correctAnswer: Do not put oil on the meal offering of a woman suspected of adultery
questions.explanation: Commandment #137 forbids putting oil on the meal offering brought for a woman suspected of adultery, as indicated in Numbers 5:15.

questions.question: Which commandment forbids putting frankincense on the meal offering of a woman suspected of adultery?
options: Do not put frankincense on the meal offering of a woman suspected of adultery
Do not put oil on the meal offering of a woman suspected of adultery
Do not remarry your ex-wife after she has married someone else
Do not strike your father and mother
questions.correctAnswer: Do not put frankincense on the meal offering of a woman suspected of adultery
questions.explanation: Commandment #138 forbids putting frankincense on the meal offering for a woman suspected of adultery, according to Numbers 5:15.

questions.question: Which negative commandment forbids letting Moabite and Ammonite males marry into the Covenant people?
options: Do not let Moabite and Ammonite males marry into the Covenant people
Do not let a eunuch marry into the Covenant people
Do not marry those who are not members of the Covenant
Do not let a child born due to an illegal relationship marry into the Covenant people
questions.correctAnswer: Do not let Moabite and Ammonite males marry into the Covenant people
questions.explanation: Commandment #163 forbids Moabite and Ammonite males from marrying into the Covenant people, as stated in Deuteronomy 23:4.

questions.question: Which commandment forbids letting a eunuch marry into the Covenant people?
options: Do not let a eunuch marry into the Covenant people
Do not let a child born due to an illegal relationship marry into the Covenant people
Do not marry those who are not members of the Covenant
Do not offer peace to Ammon and Moab while besieging them
questions.correctAnswer: Do not let a eunuch marry into the Covenant people
questions.explanation: Commandment #167 forbids eunuchs from marrying into the Covenant people, as found in Deuteronomy 23:1.

questions.question: Which commandment forbids offering peace to Ammon and Moab while besieging them?
options: Do not offer peace to Ammon and Moab while besieging them
Do not let Moabite and Ammonite males marry into the Covenant people
Do not marry those who are not members of the Covenant
Do not curse your father and mother
questions.correctAnswer: Do not offer peace to Ammon and Moab while besieging them
questions.explanation: Commandment #603 forbids offering peace to Ammon and Moab during a siege, as stated in Deuteronomy 23:7.
